name: coreplus Web Grid Template
description:
Web Grid System


The grid system is a way to structure and present content and imagery in a much more readable, manageable way on screen. Designing helps to build understanding and brings order to the page as well create an experience for the viewer.


The container size on the current site is 1190, with gutter of 25px on each side. This makes it technically 1140px for content.


  • The container size: 1190px
  • Each side gutter: 25px
  • Content 1140px
